amendment.description: To direct funding to the American Dream Downpayment Initiative.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2839 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2839 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Martinez. (consideration: CR S11404-11405) To direct funding to the American Dream Downpayment Initiative.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2839 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2839 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Martinez.
